message.body: How are u feeling? Is anything broken? Really liked the foot doc who I saw today. I have surgery scheduled for ######.
No obvious breaks! Only have to get more detailed imaging if I'm still in pain next week. Good luck with the surgery - I will cross my fingers!!
And I will keep mine crossed that ur pain subsides by next week! Let me know if ur up for a swim.
I will. I sure hope I can swim by next week. Most of the cuts and scrapes are healing well, so we'll see!
